excerpt.rendered:
The Macallan 1824 Masters set is a collectable high end series consisting of 4 beautiful sherry matured whiskies:

The Macallan Rare Cask (43% abv)
The Macallan Reflexion (43% abv)
The Macallan No. 6 (43% abv)
The Macallan M (44.7% abv)

This set sits beautifully in any shelf and is a treat for a good occasion. Each bottle comes with its original and luxurious packaging.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
